comprehensive_overview: PICRUSt2 (Phylogenetic Investigation of Communities by Reconstruction of Unobserved States 2) is a software package designed for predicting metagenome functional content from marker gene surveys of microbial communities. It leverages evolutionary modeling to predict the gene content of microbial taxa in a community and their metabolic potentials.
core_features: Evolutionary modeling for gene content prediction
Metabolic potential inference for microbial communities
